title: Call Me Lady
description: This is an alternate cover edition - ASIN: B06XSQTTP2Joss is a single unmarried cop who takes her time when she meets her soulmate while walking her dog. Her best friend, Tassa DeSalada, gives her lots of great guy (and sex) advice, in a very girly way. There's a great sex scene and a happily-ever-after ending.
author: Tassa Desalada
